00014     namespace sketch

00016         PathComponent::PathComponent(Path *path)
00017         {
00018             this->path = path;
00019         }
00020 
00021         PathComponent::~PathComponent()
00022         {
00023             for(vector<PathSegment*>::iterator iterator = segments.begin();
00024                     iterator != segments.end(); iterator++)
00025                 delete (*iterator);
00026         }
00027 
00028         Path *PathComponent::getPath() const
00029         {
00030             return path;
00031         }
00032 
00033         int PathComponent::getNumberOfSegments() const
00034         {
00035             return (int) segments.size();
00036         }
00037 
00038         PathSegment *PathComponent::getSegment(int index) const
00039         {
00040             return segments[index];
00041         }
00042 
00043         void PathComponent::addSegment(PathSegment *segment)
00044         {
00045             segments.push_back(segment);
00046         }
00047 
00048         void PathComponent::close()
00049         {
00050             if(segments.size() >= 1) {
00051                 Vector2D start = segments[0]->getPoint(0.0f);
00052                 Vector2D end = segments[segments.size() - 1]->getPoint(1.0f);
00053                 addSegment(new LineSegment(start, end));
00054             }
00055         }
00056 
00057         void PathComponent::render(Renderer *renderer) const
00058         {
00059             renderer->begin(RENDERTYPE_LINE_STRIP);
00060 
00061             for(int i = 0; i < getNumberOfSegments(); i++) {
00062                 PathSegment *segment = getSegment(i);
00063                 float increment = Path::getSubdivideLength() /
00064                         segment->getLength();
00065 
00066                 renderer->vector(segment->getPoint(0.0f));
00067                 for(float t = increment; t < 1.0f; t += increment) {
00068                     renderer->vector(segment->getPoint(t));
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 renderer->vector(segment->getPoint(1.0f));
00072             }
00073 
00074             renderer->end();
00075         }
00076     }
00077 }
